name: places/ChIJ50loWJZYwokR4LzqD3sQYR4
adrFormatAddress: 1001 5th Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: Dr Copeland was recommended to me by a close friend who had procedures done with her.  I had my breast implants removed, plus liposuction to use the fat transferred to form  “natural” breasts which I absolutely love.  Dr Copeland is very professional and I felt safe and informed at all times.  I had multiple follow up appointments to ensure all was well.  Also it was nice having a female surgeon in a male dominated industry.

originalText.text: Over many decades, Dr Copeland has treated my recurrent skin cancers with thoughtful care.She reconstructed my nose after an invasive Mohs surgery; no one can see the scars. Most recently she removed eyelid skin obstructing my vision: I recovered pain free with little bruising and perfect results. You will not find a more experienced, dedicated plastic surgeon in all of competitive NYC. Her administrative staff and nurse are thoughtful and caring professionals.

originalText.text:
"Unbelievable " is an understaement!!
Dr. Copeland and Dr. Libby Copeland-Halperin, there are not enough words to express the knowledge, talent, artistic eye, passion and care that you exude.

I had sagging and ruptured breast implants that required fat transplant from my legs...resulting in amazing and youthful breasts!!!

Dr. Copeland's keen eyes and great mind also helped take years off my face using various fillers.

The entire staff was caring, concerned and attentive throughout the process. Doctors Copeland and Copeland-Halperin, "thank you" from the bottom of my heart for giving me a new lease on life.

ALSO Dr. Copeland's Face and Body products is the BEST by far!!!
The positve results are Aaammazing!!!!!

originalText.text: Such a wonderful experience from beginning to end.  Dr. Copeland and staff were simply the best.  I had calf liposuction and could not be happier. My calves have always been a part of my body I was not happy with and Dr. Copeland did an amazing job.  I highly recommend this doctor!!

originalText.text:
Dr. Michelle Copeland and her staff are absolutely Amazing!
I needed to get two (2) Lipoma
removed, my Forehead and my
Neck. She was very informative.
She explained the procedure in
detail and answered all my questions. The results are fantastic. Great Doctor, I highly recommend Dr. Michelle Copeland.
